originalText.text: Stephane’s expertise and excellence in all that she does was evident throughout my entire experience working with her. As a first time purchaser from out of state, I started my Manhattan real estate journey in need of some guidance and the patience to answer the many questions that I had. She took the time to understand the details of my situation, and I felt that she truly went above and beyond to help me through every phase of the co-op purchasing process. Her communication and understanding of NYC real estate proceedings are unparalleled. When the need arises for a real estate attorney in the future, Stephane will absolutely be my first phone call. I cannot recommend her highly enough!

originalText.text: Stephane is by far one of the best attorney’s in New York City. She handles all of my real estate transactions with much detail and care. She’s very hands-on and honest. I’ve referred her to many of my clients. If you’re looking for someone that is thorough and quick to respond, I can assure you she is the one to hire. Working with her as been an absolute pleasure!

originalText.text: There are reasons they say buying a home is one of the most stressful experiences, becasue it is. That is why Stephane Zwirn's professionalism, grace, and swiftness were so gratefully appreciated when I retained her to help me. Her guidance was invaluable in navigating me through a purchase with an NYC COOP, a refinance, and a share transfer. I cannot recommend her highly enough. She will keep cool under the most intense pressure and ridiculous circumstances.

originalText.text: I have worked with Stephane on several deals in the past few years. When  she's been retained by my clients, I know they'll be protected and the closing will be smooth. I highly recommend her.
